title: Luxembourg Asylum Applications
description: Asylum Applications in Luxembourg increased to 300 persons in September from 220 persons in August of 2022. Asylum Applications in Luxembourg averaged 146.62 persons from 2010 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 430 persons in December of 2015 and a record low of 25 persons in April of 2020. Asylum Application in this page refers to first time asylum applicants. Data is supplied to Trading Economics by the Eurostat, National Ministries of Interior and other official agencies.
author: EUROSTAT
